body_html:
There's work in progress on a Dataset-based replacement here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/data/python/ops/prefetching_ops.py

Currently the only use is in TF Eager (as an option to tf.contrib.eager.Iterator) but it should be possible to apply it to graph-mode models as well.

/cc @rohan100jain

There's work in progress on a Dataset-based replacement here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/data/python/ops/prefetching_ops.py
Currently the only use is in TF Eager (as an option to tf.contrib.eager.Iterator) but it should be possible to apply it to graph-mode models as well.
/cc @rohan100jain
body:
There's work in progress on a `Dataset`-based replacement here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/data/python/ops/prefetching_ops.py

Currently the only use is in TF Eager (as an option to `tf.contrib.eager.Iterator`) but it should be possible to apply it to graph-mode models as well.

/cc @rohan100jain
